Uses of Class
it.polimi.ingsw.common.EventDispatcher

Packages that use EventDispatcher
Package
Description
it.polimi.ingsw.client
Classes that implement the client of the Masters of Renaissance game.
it.polimi.ingsw.common
Classes common to the server and the client of the Masters of Renaissance game.
it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model
Classes that implement the model of the server of the Masters of Renaissance game.
it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.leadercards
This package contains the implementation of the leader cards of Masters of Renaissance.
it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.resourcecontainers
This package contains the implementation of the resource containers of Masters of Renaissance.
it.polimi.ingsw.server
Classes that implement the server of the Masters of Renaissance game.

    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.common with parameters of type EventDispatcher
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    View.registerOnModelGameContext​(EventDispatcher gameContext)
    Registers this View as a listener for GameContext-related events
    void
    View.registerOnModelLobby​(EventDispatcher lobby)
    Registers this View as a listener for Lobby-related events
    void
    View.unregisterOnModelGameContext​(EventDispatcher gameContext)
    Unregisters this View as a listener for events dispatched by the EventDispatcher gameContext (stops listening)
    void
    View.unregisterOnModelLobby​(EventDispatcher lobby)
    Unregisters this View as a listener for events dispatched by the EventDispatcher lobby (stops listening)

    Class
    Description

    DepotLeader
    Leader card with the ability of storing resources, which will be considered as part of the player's warehouse.

    Card with a special ability.

    Leader card with the ability to produce resources.
    class

    Leader card with the ability to transform white marbles into a resource when taken from the market.

    This interface represents a container of storable resources.

    ResourceShelf

    Shelf
    This class represents a finite container of resources of the same type.

    Strongbox
    This class represents an infinite container of resources.
    static class 
    Warehouse.WarehouseShelf
    This class represents a shelf in a warehouse, that is a shelf that cannot contain a resource that is contained also in another shelf of the same warehouse.
